summary.para: Provides values for the COM unmarshaling policy global option.

Unmarshaling behavior is the same as versions older than Windows 8. EOAC_NO_CUSTOM_MARSHAL restrictions apply if this flag is set in . Otherwise, there are no restrictions. This is the default for processes that aren't in the app container.
Unmarshaling allows only a system-trusted list of hardened unmarshalers and unmarshalers allowed per-process by the function. This is the default for processes in the app container.

Unmarshaling data whose source is app container allows only a system-trusted list of hardened unmarshalers and unmarshalers allowed per-process by the function. Unmarshaling behavior for data with a source that's not app container is unchanged from previous versions.
